Class MqttHelper

java.lang.Object
  ev3steuerung.MqttHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttCallback
public class MqttHelper
extends Object
implements org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttCallback, Runnable

Support class to handle MQTT. Designed for use in package ev3steuerung

Author:
Martin Schöne

indicateTask

protected boolean indicateTask(String task,
                               String result)
Indicates a task to the MES, as shown in Mr. Ringel's state diagram in transition 5 and PROC -> MAINT.

Parameters:
task - - String representation of the Recipe that was worked on
result - - String representation of the result the work came out [done, terminated, abort]
Returns:
True - If the TaskIndication message could be sent successfully
See Also:

messageArrived

public void messageArrived(String topic,
                           org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttMessage message)
                    throws Exception
Handles incoming messages for all topics, specially forwards from topic vwp/DEVICE_ID to EV3_Brick

Specified by:
messageArrived in interface org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttCallback
Parameters:
topic - - Topic on which it has been recieved
message - - MqttMessage of incoming transaction
Throws:
Exception - - If there was an error while forwarding messages
